SERDES PCIE

============================================================================

Introduction

Purpose and Scope

This module deals with setting up SERDES configuration for PCIE. The API flow should be as follows:
CSL_PCIeSerdesInit (base_addr, ref_clock, rate);

CSL_SerdesLaneEnable (&serdes_lane_enable_params);
